summary: The 'Saving Our Veterans Lives Act of 2025' directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a program providing secure firearm storage items (e.g., lockboxes) to eligible veterans. The bill mandates a public education campaign about the program, reports to Congress, and specifies item definitions. It also includes education materials on secure storage and suicide prevention.  The bill authorizes $5 million annually from 2026-2036.  It clarifies that participation does not impact lawful firearm ownership or necessitate registration.
